DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Topical ophthalmic nucleoside analog . Patients must : Confirmation HIV infection . Documented CMV infection . No past present CMV disease ( e.g. , retinitis , colitis , esophagitis ) . Adequate visualization retina eye ophthalmologist . CD4 count < = 50 cells/mm3 ( patient WITHOUT history AIDSdefining opportunistic infection chronic gynecologic infection ) OR CD4 count < = 100 cells/mm3 ( patient WITH history AIDSdefining opportunistic infection chronic gynecologic infection ) . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Presence gastrointestinal disease symptom control medication ( e.g. , persistent nausea , abdominal pain persistent diarrhea within past 4 week controllable medication ) . Inability comply protocol . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : The following nucleoside analog : IV ganciclovir , IV acyclovir 2 week total duration , oral acyclovir dos > 1000 mg/day , vidarabine , amantadine hydrochloride , cytarabine , idoxuridine . FIAU , FIAC , foscarnet , CMV hyperimmune globulin , IV immune globulin , CMV monoclonal antibody , HPMPC . Imipenemcilastatin ( Primaxin ) . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History hypersensitivity acyclovir . Prior Medication : Excluded within past 60 day : Ganciclovir , foscarnet , FIAC , FIAU , CMV hyperimmune globulin , CMV monoclonal antibody , HPMPC .
